org.jgentleframework.core.reflection.metadata
Interface DefinitionCore

All Superinterfaces:
MetadataControl
All Known Subinterfaces:
Definition
public interface DefinitionCore
extends MetadataControl

This interface represents all methods that are responsible for Definition instantiation and management.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com

Method Detail

buildAnnoMeta

void buildAnnoMeta()
Create AnnoMeta content of current Definition.

containsMeta

boolean containsMeta(AnnoMeta annoMeta)
Returns true if this Definition contains given AnnoMeta.

Parameters:
annoMeta - the AnnoMeta whose presence in this Definition is to be tested.
Returns:
true if this Definition contains a specified AnnoMeta, false otherwise.

getAnnoMeta

AnnoMeta getAnnoMeta()
Returns current AnnoMeta of this Definition

Returns:
the annoMeta

getConstructorDefList

java.util.HashMap<java.lang.reflect.Constructor<?>,Definition> getConstructorDefList()
Returns a HashMap containing all member Definitions corresponding to Constructor objects specified in the object class which this Definition is interpreted of.

Note: this method is only performed if current Definition is interpreted of object class.

getFieldDefList

java.util.HashMap<java.lang.reflect.Field,Definition> getFieldDefList()
Returns a HashMap containing all member Definitions corresponding to Field objects specified in the object class which this Definition is interpreted of.

Note: this method is only performed if current Definition is interpreted of object class.

getMethodDefList

java.util.HashMap<java.lang.reflect.Method,Definition> getMethodDefList()
Returns a HashMap containing all member Definitions corresponding to Method objects specified in the object class which this Definition is interpreted of.

Note: this method is only performed if current Definition is interpreted of object class.

getOriginalAnnotation

<T extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> T getOriginalAnnotation(java.lang.Class<T> annotation)
Returns an instance of original annotation according as its given object class.
Note: the returned annotation instance is original annotation, not proxied annotation. To get the proxied annotation, invoke AnnotatedElement.getAnnotation(Class)

Type Parameters:
T - object class represents type of desired annotation.
Parameters:
annotation - object class of desired annotation.
Returns:
returns an annotation instance is it exists, null otherwise.

getOriginalAnnotations

java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] getOriginalAnnotations()
Returns an array containing all original annotations of this Definition

Returns:
returns an array containing alloriginal annotation, if not exists, returns an empty array.

getParameterDefList

Definition[] getParameterDefList()
Returns an array containing all member Definitions of all parameters of the method object which this Definition is interpreted of.

Note: this method is only performed if current Definition is interpreted of the Method object.

Returns:
an ArrayList of member Definitions, if does not find any corresponding Definition, returns an empty ArrayList. In case this Definition is not interpreted of one Method object, the returned value will be null.

isInterpretedOfClass

boolean isInterpretedOfClass()
Returns true if this Definition is interpreted of one object class, otherwise returns false.

isInterpretedOfConstructor

boolean isInterpretedOfConstructor()
Returns true if this Definition is interpreted of one Constructor object, otherwise returns false.

isInterpretedOfField

boolean isInterpretedOfField()
Returns true if this Definition is interpreted of one Field object, otherwise returns false.

isInterpretedOfMethod

boolean isInterpretedOfMethod()
Returns true if this Definition is interpreted of one Method object, otherwise returns false.

setOriginalAnnotations

void setOriginalAnnotations(java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] originalAnnotations)
Set original annotations

Note: The invoking of this method will also execute creating of AnnoMeta content by automate invoke buildAnnoMeta() method after all original annotations is setted.

Parameters:
originalAnnotations - array of original annotations need to be set.

setParameterDefList

void setParameterDefList(Definition[] parameterDefList)
Parameters:
parameterDefList -

setValueOfAnnotation

java.lang.Object setValueOfAnnotation(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotation,
                                      java.lang.String valueName,
                                      java.lang.Object value)
Set a new value to an attribute of specified annotation in this Definition.

Parameters:
annotation - object class of specified annotation need to be set a new value.
valueName - name of specified attribute of annotation.
value - new object value
Returns:
returns the previous value associated with attribute, or null if there was no specified value for attribute. (A null return can also indicate that the attribute previously associated null with value.)
